review: This is an interesting little product.  I just got it and hardware wise it works well, however a few things I have to note that were not real clear before I bought it.  It works well if you want to use it only to access hulu, netflix, or hbogo AND already pay for those, but if you really want to use the power of this you NEED to have a prime subscription for $99 a year otherwise most stuff doesn't work.  Also if you have had prime ever in the past and canceled it you do NOT get the option of a trial to evaluate this.  Another thing I found , enable parental controls when you set this up or it is very easy to accidentally order something, and amazon will charge any credit card you have given them in the past.  They don't give you a second screen to warn you.  Overall a Nice device just understand these things before you buy it.  I'm regretting not doing better research myself.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Does what it's supposed to do. I've had Roku and Apple TV's, but this does essentially the same thing only in a stick it's a lot cheaper. Makes it easy to access all the Amazon Prime video content, yet still allows me to connect to HuluPlus, Netflix, and a bunch of other apps. I would recommend for an inexpensive alternative to some other competitive devices.
